original: HELLGREN, Samuel (Sam) Reinhold, Mäklare, Stockholm, f Chicago, USA, 8/8 90 av arkit R W H o h h, f Englund, gm Lillemor Staalesen. Efter avsl lärov.studier anst å faderns mäkl.kontor 10, komp m fadern i den t fma Hellgren & Co, Sthlm, öman dr f man 12. Ensam inneh av dna fma sed. 27. Tidigare ordf i Sv Egendomsmäkl.frn. Medl American Club, Sv Amerik Sällsk, Timmerm.orden, Par Bricole. Hobbies: Sång, bridge o sport.
translated: HELLGREN, Samuel (Sam) Reinhold, Broker, Stockholm, born Chicago, USA, 8/8 1890, son of architect R.W.H. and H.H., born Englund. Married to Lillemor Staalesen. After completing his studies, he worked at his father's brokerage firm at the age of 10 and became a partner in the firm Hellgren & Co. in Stockholm at the age of 12. He solely owned the firm since 1927. Former chairman of the Swedish Real Estate Brokers Association. Member of the American Club, Swedish American Society, Timber Merchants' Order, and Par Bricole. Hobbies: Singing, bridge, and sports.
